function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased noise complaints across various noise sources","Impact":"Potential increase in stress, irritation, and sleep disturbance for individuals","Mitigation":"Implement noise reduction measures, enforce noise regulations, and promote education on noise control","Technologies":"Soundproofing materials, noise monitoring devices, and noise cancellation technology","People":"Individuals living in areas with high noise levels","Owner":"Local authorities, building owners, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Significant increase in indoor noise levels during the lockdown","Impact":"Potential negative impact on mental health and overall well-being of individuals","Mitigation":"Promote use of soundproofing materials, create noise-free zones, and establish noise reduction guidelines","Technologies":"Soundproofing materials, noise monitoring devices, and noise cancellation technology","People":"People staying indoors during the lockdown","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Sleep disturbance due to neighbor noise during lockdown","Impact":"Increased risk of sleep deprivation, fatigue, and reduced productivity","Mitigation":"Enforce quiet hours, promote neighbor communication, and utilize soundproofing solutions","Technologies":"Smart home devices for noise monitoring, sound masking systems, and community communication platforms","People":"Residents affected by neighbor noise","Owner":"Residential community management, neighbors, and local authorities"}]}
